title: EvidenceItem
description: An evidence item that supports or contradicts a claim, with source grading.

evidence_id.description: Unique identifier for the evidence item

source_span_id.description: Reference to the document span where this evidence was extracted

source_system.description: Origin system (e.g., Stripe, QuickBooks, Bank, Audit, Deck, ResearchProvider)

upstream_origin_id.description: Required for independence tests in corroboration

retrieval_timestamp.description: When this evidence was retrieved from the source

verification_status.description: Current verification status of this evidence

source_rank_subgrade.description: Internal analytics subgrade (not used in gating)
